title: 12月8 民陣吹大雞 國際人權集會

replies.msg:
【守護香港．和你同行】
——12.8 民陣國際人權日集會

Stand With Hong Kong, Walk With You All:
12.8 Human Rights Day Assembly
Organiser: Civil Human Rights Front

自 1950 年起，聯合國把每年的 12 月 10 日定為「國際人權日」。世界人權逐步完善，向前發展；但香港的人權狀況卻不斷倒退。

Human Rights Day is observed every year on 10 December. This year, Human Rights Day marks the 70th anniversary While protections of human rights advance, Hong King’s human rights situation is deteriorating.

今年六月至今，香港人奮不顧身抵擋破壞人權的惡法，付上沉重代價：不少人權捍衛者受到警察暴力而嚴重受傷、近五千名示威者被捕，當中更包括未成年者和人道救援人員。政制繼續不義，行政機關濫權、任由警察執法不公；北京更開始抨擊香港司法裁決，威脅要剝奪違憲審查權。香港人權和人道危機，經已到達臨界點。

Since summer this year, people in Hong Kong have been resisting the law the damages human rights protections with blood and sweat. A heavy price is paid. Myriads of human rights defenders suffered from police brutality, nearly 5,000 citizens were arrested, including minors and humanitarian workers. Unjust political system remains, the executive government abuses its power and tolerates unfair enforcement of law by police. The authority from Beijing commences to criticise court judgement against the anti-mask law, implying a threat to deprive the court’s duty of constitutional review.

Hong King’s human rights violations and humanitarian crisis are reaching the tipping point now.

根據《基本法》第 39 條和現行法例，適用於香港的聯合國人權公約共有十五條，其中七條訂明要求締約國包括香港提交報告。故此，香港本來是捍衛國際人權的一員。如今香港人權保障被政權不斷破壞，社會各界豈能繼續沉默，任由捍衛人權的前線人員受害？

There are 15 UN human rights treaties applicable to Hong Kong, according to article 39 of the Basic Law, as well as other laws and regulations. 7 of them require Hong Kong to submit periodic reports. It means that Hong Kong is indeed a member of international human rights regime. In face of state violations of human rights, everyone shall not remain silent and let the frontline human rights defenders suffer again.

今年國際人權日步入 70 周年，民陣決定在 12 月 8 日（星期日）日間舉辦大型集會，呼籲全港市民出席，要求香港政府恪守《世界人權宣言》和適用於香港的聯合國人權公約，履行國際人權責任，維護人道主義和人性尊嚴。

In the beginning of the 70th anniversary of Human Rights Day, Civil Human Rights Front will hold a public assembly on 8th December (Sunday), to urge public participation, and ask the government to uphold its commitment to Universal Declaration of Human Rights and all UN human rights treaties applicable to Hong Kong, in order to fulfil the duty of international human rights protections, and defend humanitarianism and human dignity.

民間人權陣線
2019 年 11 月 20 日

【集會時間地點】
12.8 星期日 Sunday
2-6PM
維多利亞公園 Victoria Park
不反對通知書申請中

#守護香港 #和你同行
#StandUp4HumanRights

示威者入面仲會混咗啲唔知咩人喺度， 同埋難以預測班警犬點玩，根本佢哋剝曬話你點就點。

冇乜可能完全和平進行。

quote.msg:
【守護香港．和你同行】
——12.8 民陣國際人權日集會

Stand With Hong Kong, Walk With You All:
12.8 Human Rights Day Assembly
Organiser: Civil Human Rights Front

自 1950 年起，聯合國把每年的 12 月 10 日定為「國際人權日」。世界人權逐步完善，向前發展；但香港的人權狀況卻不斷倒退。

Human Rights Day is observed every year on 10 December. This year, Human Rights Day marks the 70th anniversary While protections of human rights advance, Hong King’s human rights situation is deteriorating.

今年六月至今，香港人奮不顧身抵擋破壞人權的惡法，付上沉重代價：不少人權捍衛者受到警察暴力而嚴重受傷、近五千名示威者被捕，當中更包括未成年者和人道救援人員。政制繼續不義，行政機關濫權、任由警察執法不公；北京更開始抨擊香港司法裁決，威脅要剝奪違憲審查權。香港人權和人道危機，經已到達臨界點。

Since summer this year, people in Hong Kong have been resisting the law the damages human rights protections with blood and sweat. A heavy price is paid. Myriads of human rights defenders suffered from police brutality, nearly 5,000 citizens were arrested, including minors and humanitarian workers. Unjust political system remains, the executive government abuses its power and tolerates unfair enforcement of law by police. The authority from Beijing commences to criticise court judgement against the anti-mask law, implying a threat to deprive the court’s duty of constitutional review.

Hong King’s human rights violations and humanitarian crisis are reaching the tipping point now.

根據《基本法》第 39 條和現行法例，適用於香港的聯合國人權公約共有十五條，其中七條訂明要求締約國包括香港提交報告。故此，香港本來是捍衛國際人權的一員。如今香港人權保障被政權不斷破壞，社會各界豈能繼續沉默，任由捍衛人權的前線人員受害？

There are 15 UN human rights treaties applicable to Hong Kong, according to article 39 of the Basic Law, as well as other laws and regulations. 7 of them require Hong Kong to submit periodic reports. It means that Hong Kong is indeed a member of international human rights regime. In face of state violations of human rights, everyone shall not remain silent and let the frontline human rights defenders suffer again.

今年國際人權日步入 70 周年，民陣決定在 12 月 8 日（星期日）日間舉辦大型集會，呼籲全港市民出席，要求香港政府恪守《世界人權宣言》和適用於香港的聯合國人權公約，履行國際人權責任，維護人道主義和人性尊嚴。

In the beginning of the 70th anniversary of Human Rights Day, Civil Human Rights Front will hold a public assembly on 8th December (Sunday), to urge public participation, and ask the government to uphold its commitment to Universal Declaration of Human Rights and all UN human rights treaties applicable to Hong Kong, in order to fulfil the duty of international human rights protections, and defend humanitarianism and human dignity.

民間人權陣線
2019 年 11 月 20 日

【集會時間地點】
12.8 星期日 Sunday
2-6PM
維多利亞公園 Victoria Park
不反對通知書申請中

#守護香港 #和你同行
#StandUp4HumanRights

香港金融業職工總會（香港金總）將於2019年11月23日（星期六）下午5時正舉行特別會員大會，以商討政治工業行動事宜。大會開始前一小時(下午4時至5時)亦有招收會員活動。請各會員及有意者撥冗出席。會議地點尚有待確定，唯盡量安排於九龍或港島區一帶。最新消息將2019年11月22日（星期五）前盡快公佈。

今年六月至今，香港人奮不顧身抵擋破壞人權的惡法，付上沉重代價：不少人權捍衛者受到警察暴力而嚴重受傷、近五千名示威者被捕，當中更包括未成年者和人道救援人員。政制繼續不義，行政機關濫權、任由警察執法不公；北京更開始抨擊香港司法裁決，威脅要剝奪違憲審查權。香港人權和人道危機，經已到達臨界點。

Hong King’s human rights violations and humanitarian crisis are reaching the tipping point now.

quote.msg:
【守護香港．和你同行】
——12.8 民陣國際人權日集會

Stand With Hong Kong, Walk With You All:
12.8 Human Rights Day Assembly
Organiser: Civil Human Rights Front

自 1950 年起，聯合國把每年的 12 月 10 日定為「國際人權日」。世界人權逐步完善，向前發展；但香港的人權狀況卻不斷倒退。

Human Rights Day is observed every year on 10 December. This year, Human Rights Day marks the 70th anniversary While protections of human rights advance, Hong King’s human rights situation is deteriorating.

今年六月至今，香港人奮不顧身抵擋破壞人權的惡法，付上沉重代價：不少人權捍衛者受到警察暴力而嚴重受傷、近五千名示威者被捕，當中更包括未成年者和人道救援人員。政制繼續不義，行政機關濫權、任由警察執法不公；北京更開始抨擊香港司法裁決，威脅要剝奪違憲審查權。香港人權和人道危機，經已到達臨界點。

Since summer this year, people in Hong Kong have been resisting the law the damages human rights protections with blood and sweat. A heavy price is paid. Myriads of human rights defenders suffered from police brutality, nearly 5,000 citizens were arrested, including minors and humanitarian workers. Unjust political system remains, the executive government abuses its power and tolerates unfair enforcement of law by police. The authority from Beijing commences to criticise court judgement against the anti-mask law, implying a threat to deprive the court’s duty of constitutional review.

Hong King’s human rights violations and humanitarian crisis are reaching the tipping point now.

根據《基本法》第 39 條和現行法例，適用於香港的聯合國人權公約共有十五條，其中七條訂明要求締約國包括香港提交報告。故此，香港本來是捍衛國際人權的一員。如今香港人權保障被政權不斷破壞，社會各界豈能繼續沉默，任由捍衛人權的前線人員受害？

There are 15 UN human rights treaties applicable to Hong Kong, according to article 39 of the Basic Law, as well as other laws and regulations. 7 of them require Hong Kong to submit periodic reports. It means that Hong Kong is indeed a member of international human rights regime. In face of state violations of human rights, everyone shall not remain silent and let the frontline human rights defenders suffer again.

今年國際人權日步入 70 周年，民陣決定在 12 月 8 日（星期日）日間舉辦大型集會，呼籲全港市民出席，要求香港政府恪守《世界人權宣言》和適用於香港的聯合國人權公約，履行國際人權責任，維護人道主義和人性尊嚴。

In the beginning of the 70th anniversary of Human Rights Day, Civil Human Rights Front will hold a public assembly on 8th December (Sunday), to urge public participation, and ask the government to uphold its commitment to Universal Declaration of Human Rights and all UN human rights treaties applicable to Hong Kong, in order to fulfil the duty of international human rights protections, and defend humanitarianism and human dignity.

民間人權陣線
2019 年 11 月 20 日

【集會時間地點】
12.8 星期日 Sunday
2-6PM
維多利亞公園 Victoria Park
不反對通知書申請中

#守護香港 #和你同行
#StandUp4HumanRights
